name: 2019 Asia Pacific Information Technology Conference APIT in Jeju Island, South Korea
content: Conference official website：http://www.apit.net/ Meeting time：January 25-27, 2019\. Meeting place：Jeju Island, South Korea. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Chin-Chen Chang - Feng Chia University, Taiwan. Prof. Yong Jin Park - Hanyang University, South Korea and University Malaysia Sabah, Malaysia. Published by： The accepted and registered papers can be published in the Conference Proceedings which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Call for Papers： Information Theory. Automata Theory. Pattern Recognition. Data Mining. Soft Computing. Computer Architecture. Photonics Network. Mobile Networks. Robotics. Computer Vision. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : December 10, 2018\. Conference Contact :Mr. Paul Choo. mailbox: apit.conference@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560
